column2: support the mission of our Library of Congress web properties.
we use commercial software products to analyze and report on aggregated web metrics data.
The Library wants to provide our users with the best online experience possible. As such, we use commercial software products to analyze and report on aggregated web metrics data.

Some of these sites provide games and activities, and occasionally, we collect personally identifiable information in order to complete the one-time game or activity. We do not use the information for any other purpose
